idea-plugin.name: Pit4U
idea-plugin.description: Plugin for IntelliJ that enables you to run PIT mutation tests (pitest.org) directly from your IDE via a new configuration that you can find in the 'Run/Debug Configurations' dialog.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 0.1.2
  • Plugin unload no longer requires restarting the IDE
Known issues
  • When a configuration is deleted, its state may survive and appear in a new configuration

Version 0.1.1
  • Fixed missing plugin action error (which will be released in an upcoming version)
  • Fixed out-of-bounds error on Windows
  • Advanced parameters are now correctly parsed
  • Packages can now be chosen pressing Enter/return
Known issues
  • When a configuration is deleted, its state may survive and appear in a new configuration
  • Plugin fails to unload without restarting the IDE

Version 0.1.0
  • First iteration that adds a new configuration to run PIT mutation tests
